snippet: LeBron James scored 27 points, and the Cavaliers opened a 2-0 lead in their playoff series with a 107-90 victory over the visiting Detroit Pistons.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Detroit Pistons, 107-90, to lead first-round playoff series, 2-0; other basketball scores and news noted.
